To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private HaramiCross _haramicross;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_haramicross = HaramiCross(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_haramicross.IsReady)
{
    var current = _haramicross.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.haramicross = self.HaramiCross(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.haramicross.IsReady:
    current = self.haramicross.Current.Value
